name: conductor
description: Playback' automated playback system for VLC

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npm run lint && npm run format && tsc
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rm -rf ~/playback/conductor && cp ./package.json ./dist/package.json && cd ./dist && npm install --omit=dev && cd .. &&  cp -r ./dist ~/playback/conductor

author: PJ Evans <pj@mrpjevans.com>
